title: Add contact button with email mailto link

requirements.summary: Add a 'Contact Us' button in the frontend that opens a mailto link to viitjeetec@gmail.com
acceptanceCriteria: A contact button is visible on the landing page
Clicking the button opens the user's default email client with 'To:' field pre-filled with viitjeetec@gmail.com
The button uses a mailto: link (e.g., mailto:viitjeetec@gmail.com)
Button styling is consistent with the existing warm orange theme and UI design
Button includes appropriate accessible label text in English (e.g., 'Contact Us' or 'Get in Touch')

file_operations.description: Add a 'Contact Us' button with mailto:viitjeetec@gmail.com link positioned in a visible location (header navigation or footer/about section). Use consistent warm orange theme styling (bg-primary, hover states) and ensure accessible label text. The button should integrate naturally with the existing landing page layout without disrupting current content.
